The nfo states:
  "For people who still play this"

LOL, because games nowadays are always released with a ton of bugs, I always wait a couple of months before starting with a game. Often there will be some patches then that makes the game playable.

So, maybe I'll start playing this game.

Thanks to the developers, the crackers, the uploaders and TPB.
